content.raw: I wonder if we should take the opposite approach: have the nodes be identified by  the `id` attribute instead of `name` attribute. I imagine the collada specification demands that `id`s are unique whereas `name` might get repeated, so `id` would be a more reliable way to distinguish between nodes.
content.html: I wonder if we should take the opposite approach: have the nodes be identified by the id attribute instead of name attribute. I imagine the collada specification demands that ids are unique whereas name might get repeated, so id would be a more reliable way to distinguish between nodes.
